review: I got this as a result of pre-paying for 3 months of SlingTV as Sling TV was not available on xbox at the time. There is nothing this device does that the combination of my Xbox and AppleTV do not do. However if you don't have one of these devices, the Fire TV Stick may be a decent option for you. I found the interface to be worse than other streaming devices but since I only use this for Sling TV that didn't bother me much.There seems to be some sort of timer that I haven't figured out how to turn off. While watching TV for a few hours or so the Fire TV stick will decide to activate its screen saver even though I am using the device. Sometimes the app would crash which would be extremely annoying if I was watching a game.Please note that this review is coming from somebody who already owns multiple streaming devices and had no real need for this one.
